Chairman of VINCI Construction

A graduate from École polytechnique and Ecole des ponts et chaussées, he started his career working for the Loire-Atlantique Department of Infrastructure and then for the European Commission’s Directorate-General for External Relations, before joining the VINCI Group in 1999 as Regional Director of Sogea Sud-Ouest. In 2004, he became the Chief Operating Officer of Cofiroute before being appointed Chief Executive Officer of ASF in 2007.

In May 2010 he was named Deputy Executive Officer of Eurovia in charge of International and Public-Private Partnerships. Pierre Anjolras has held the position of President of Eurovia since March 2014.

He has been appointed Chairman of VINCI Construction on January 12th and continues to fulfill all his other duties within the VINCI Group, especially as President of Eurovia.

excerpt.rendered: He is Chairman of VINCI Construction since January 2021. He continues to fulfill all his other duties within the VINCI Group, especially as President of Eurovia.
